target.text: Installing the Pidgin Instant Chat Client

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Download the pidgin.exe (Windows) or pidgin.rpm (Linux) executable file to your desktop. The URLs for downloading these files should be in your invitation e-mail.

target.name: Step
target.text: Download the pidgin.exe (Windows) or pidgin.rpm (Linux) executable file to your desktop. The URLs for downloading these files should be in your invitation e-mail.

target.name: Step
target.text: In Linux and Windows, double-click the pidgin (.rpm or .exe) installer (placed on the desktop during download), or select Open or Run to invoke the installer. It might take a while for the installation to begin on the Linux desktop.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Installer Language dialog that appears, select your language from the drop-down list. The installer wizard walks you through the installation process. The defaults should be fine for your install, though you might want to select the Shortcut > Desktop option.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Finish to complete the installation process. The integrated Pidgin instant chat client is now installed and ready for use.
